short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a small metric and imperial conversion extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a small metric and imperial conversion extension.

The Unit Conversion project requires us to build a Metric/Imperial Unit Conversion application that allows for user input to be converted into 3 different measurements, length (meter/feet), volume (liters/gallons) and mass (kilograms/pounds).

This extension was created for personal purposes only.

Project repository can be found here: 
- https://github.com/awcoetzer/unit-conversion

Images used within the project, credit goes to catalyststuff at:
- https://www.freepik.com/author/catalyststuff

version 1.02:
- Refactor of code
- Icon image support for 16, 48 and 128 pixels

version 1.03:
- Input field width expand to allow for larger number, as well as scroll over a certain length of numbers.
